 Samtliga fackliga företrädare nås på telefon 08-788 75 00
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Välkommen med din ansökan senast
 **2024-09-25** 
 . Din ansökan bör innehålla CV samt ansökningsbrev där du motiverar varför du är lämpad för en av dessa tjänster. Relevanta betyg och intyg kan gärna bifogas ansökan.
   

  

**Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 ----------------------------------------------------- Information om det rekryterande förbandet: I Högkvarteret finns överbefälhavaren och generaldirektören. Högkvarteret har ungefär 1 000 medarbetare – både yrkesofficerare och civila experter. Högkvarteret utgörs från 2023-01-01 av försvarsstaben, operationsledningen, militära underrättelse- och säkerhetstjänsten, samt Högkvarterets stabsavdelning och fristående enheter för tillsyn. En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras. I anställningen ingår även en skyldighet att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Senior Salesforce Consultant - Nordic Region
description:
We at 4C Nordics are looking for a Senior Salesforce Consultant that thrive with bringing companies and customers together. You love to juggle technology, business and people all at the same time. Become part of one of the leading Salesforce partners in EMEA and be responsible for designing and building scalable, best in class solutions for our customers. You will work across the Salesforce platform and other IT environments.
   

  

 You will very quickly sense the 4C vibe and become an important part of our 4C family. As person you thrive with freedom under responsibility and the flexibility to choose if you want to work from home or from the office.
   

  

 We are looking towards a very exciting future and are therefore looking for new skilled and talented colleagues for both Copenhagen and Oslo.
   

  

* Assist the commercial team in pre-selling and taking the requirements and translate these into tangible deliverables contributing client proposals
* Both delivering complex configuration yourself and managing the delivery of solutions through less experienced members of your project team
* Following the 4C project methodology to ensure project success. You will be responsible for making sure projects are delivered on time and to the clients/4C quality expectations, in a fast paced, Agile environment
* Going above and beyond for your customer with a can do attitude whilst remaining consultative and following Salesforce best practices
* Represent and promote the core company values
* Identifying opportunities for 4C to implement new solutions for customers
* Potentially act as a mentor to less experienced members of the team
* When acting in a lead role, update PMO on overall project status, risks, issues, budget
* Use the possibility to share as much knowledge as possible in 4C Nordics but also in the 4C group
* Travel in the Nordics or Europe are expected from time to time


**You Recognise Yourself In Most Of The Following Requirements**
* Experience in end to end Salesforce (SFDC) CRM implementations
* Experience working in a project oriented agile environment
* Experience in designing and developing software components
* You have experience from different sizes of companies plus line of industries
* Strong presentation and communication skills
* You know how to create trust and loyalty with your customer
* Strong customer facing skills, analytical approach to challenges and pro active mentality
* Salesforce Certified: App Builder/401 Developer or 201 Admin with either Sales or Service Cloud Consultant
* You know how important it is to share knowledge and get valuable knowledge in return
* It is important for you to have a good team and colleagues around you

title: Partner Compliance Counsel -Tax compliance
description:
**Build your future with Sovos.**
 If you're seeking a career where innovation meets impact, you've come to the right place. As a global leader, Sovos is transforming tax compliance from a business requirement to a force for growth while revolutionising how businesses navigate the ever-changing regulatory landscape.
   

  

 At Sovos, we're dedicated to more than just solving compliance challenges – we're committed to making a positive and lasting difference in everything we do. Our teams operate on the modern edge of digital technology, working not only to solve complex business challenges but also to enrich our personal, professional, and local communities.
   

  

 Our purpose-built systems provide the tools you need to thrive in a world where governments demand increased visibility, faster reporting and greater control over business processes. Excited about the possibilities? So are we!
   

  

 Don’t worry if you don't check all the boxes – apply anyway! We're focused on hiring the right people, not just the "right" resume. It's not about what you've done elsewhere; it's all about what you're capable of doing here.
   

  

**The Work You'll Do**
 The Regulatory Liaison Counsel - ISVs and Embedded Partners will play a critical role in supporting and growing Sovos’ global ISV ecosystem and revenue stream by engaging with the Sovos partner ecosystem and supporting their needs as they look to Sovos for ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements in their solution portfolios and customer implementations. This position combines the expertise of a Regulatory Counsel, requiring deep knowledge and ongoing involvement in the processes of the Regulatory Analysis and Design Department, with the role of a liaison officer dedicated to facilitating partners’ access to the broader regulatory function within Sovos. This role reports to the VP of Regulatory Analysis and Design.
   

  

**More Specifically You Will**
* The Regulatory Liaison Counsel is responsible for bridging the gap between Sovos' regulatory expertise and its strategic ISV partners, ensuring seamless integration of relevant compliance aspects of Sovos solutions in various markets.
* Partner closely with Sovos functions managing the business and technical aspects of relationships with ISV partners to ensure satisfaction of partners’ compliance needs within the scope of Sovos software solutions.
* Maintain accountability for a ‘regulatory helpdesk SLA’ that allows Sovos partners to act with confidence, ensuring timely and appropriate Sovos regulatory input towards their customers.
* Ensure a deep understanding of Sovos Regulatory Affairs and broader interaction with public authorities on an ongoing basis.
* Work continuously with Sovos Alliances, Sales Engineering, Product Management, and other relevant functions to develop and maintain a robust understanding of Sovos’ partner ecosystem and the specific business processes and associated compliance needs that arise in that context.
* Represent the requirements of Sovos ISV and embedded partners in the evolving scope and day-to-day execution of regulatory monitoring, design, and affairs in close collaboration with colleagues in the Regulatory Analysis and Design Department, as well as with Regulatory Affairs, Business Analysts, Product Managers, and other Sovos colleagues involved in designing, building, implementing, supporting, and maintaining Sovos solutions.
* Act as an integral part of the Regulatory Analysis and Design Department, internalizing contextual and factual knowledge that allows the Regulatory Liaison Counsel to act as independently as possible in their key role towards Sovos partners while also maintaining an excellent understanding of roles, responsibilities, and time allocation for partner support within the larger Regulatory Analysis and Design Department.
* Support the VP of Regulatory Analysis and Design and their teams to ensure optimization of resources in support of all relevant Sovos functions and help them with time and resource planning towards that goal.
* Explain complex tax rules in clear language for both tax and non-tax professionals, internally and externally.
* Support Partner Marketing by providing tax-centric marketing material and participating in webinars.
* In collaboration with Sovos Marketing and partner management functions, participate as a Sovos regulatory thought leader and subject matter expert in Partner events, advisory boards, and publications.


**What We Need From You**
* Juris Doctor (JD) degree or equivalent master’s degree in law, finance, or accounting.
* Proficiency in legislative tracking and tax research techniques.
* Experience in working within and a deep understanding of the enterprise software market, including the value-add of different categories of enterprise software to size and geographic segments in the business sector.
* Experience in working with and deep understanding of businesses’ financial, logistical, administrative, and IT processes and strategies.
* A strong affinity for and proven ability to communicate effectively with professionals in information technology, data science, and computer-assisted business processes.
* Strong team orientation with a history of working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
* Excellent research, analysis, and writing skills.
* Ability to read, interpret, and understand tax-related postings and documents.
* Ability to generate and interpret functional and high-level technical design content as it pertains to compliance and business processes.
* Self-motivated with a strong drive to succeed.
* Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize activities.
* Additional language skills are strongly preferred.
* Minimal travel required to Sovos locations and events.


**What Does Sovos Offer You?**
 The tools to enhance your life - because we want you to enjoy your life outside of work and inside!
   

  

* An opportunity to work with a global team
* Flexible within the UK, Germany, Sweden, Netherlands, or Portugal.
* Bi-Weekly Meeting Free Days!
* Mentoring Programs
* Globally recognised Training and Development programs
* Benefits


 Sovos is an equal opportunity employer committed to providing an environment that celebrates diversity and where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and employees. We do not discriminate against race, colour, religions, national origin, age, sex, marital status, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic provided by law. At Sovos, all employees are encouraged to bring their whole selves to work.
   

  

**Company Background**
 Sovos is a global provider of tax, compliance and trust solutions and services that enable businesses to navigate an increasingly regulated world with true confidence. Purpose-built for always-on compliance capabilities, our scalable IT-driven solutions meet the demands of an evolving and complex global regulatory landscape. Sovos’ cloud-based software platform provides an unparalleled level of integration with business applications and government compliance processes.
   

  

 More than 100,000 customers in 100+ countries – including half the Fortune 500 – trust Sovos for their compliance needs. Sovos annually processes more than three billion transactions across 19,000 global tax jurisdictions. Bolstered by a robust partner program more than 400 strong, Sovos brings to bear an unrivaled global network for companies across industries and geographies. Founded in 1979, Sovos has operations across the Americas and Europe, and is owned by Hg and TA Associates. For more information visit http://www.sovos.com and follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter .

title: Brand Manager- Snabbare
description:

* Generous pension and insurance benefits

* Company events, including breakfast mornings and Friday beers



 At ComeOn, we've embraced a Hybrid Work model, giving our employees the flexibility to work some days at home. Our offices are thoughtfully designed to support this model, featuring practical workspaces for focused efforts and collaborative zones for dynamic creative exchanges. We believe in the power of collaboration to drive innovation and success. While our offices are known for their vibrant atmosphere, rest assured that our primary focus is on achieving results together. We prioritize efficiency and maintain a balance between hard work and camaraderie. When you visit our offices, expect a warm welcome and professional support. Choose ComeOn for your next career move, and experience a workplace that values productivity, teamwork, and the spirit of collaborati
 



 on.At ComeOn Group we value diversity and we take concrete action to ensure fairness in our recruitment process. We are committed to assessing candidates on their merit without discriminating against any applicant for whatever reason that is protected by law. We truly value you, as you a

title: Senior Database Developer – (Product Support Team – PostgreSQL) (Bangkok based)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know our Team:**
 The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.
   

  

**The Opportunity:**
 As a member of the Database Development team, you will engage in database design, data management, and database development, all integrated with automated Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. We work in close coordination with product teams, ensuring to offer support and solutions that uphold technical excellence and fulfill business needs.
   

  

**In this Role, you’ll get to:**
* Design efficient, scalable, and maintainable database architectures, schemas and tables
* Write optimized PostgreSQL queries, SPs and functions to support various requirements
* Conduct database code review to ensure quality, efficiency, and adherence to best practices
* Diagnose and resolve performance issues, including queries, indexing and execution plan analysis
* Transfer and migrate data from various sources to PostgreSQL, ensuring data integrity and optimizing performance
* Collaborate with development teams for seamless database integration
* Utilize automated database CI/CD pipelines to streamline the development process
* Leverage advanced PostgreSQL features to enhance database performance and reliability


**What you’ll Need to Succeed:**
* Minimum 4 years of hands-on experience with PostgreSQL database development and administration
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer engineering or a related field
* Proficient in database design, ER Diagram with advanced knowledge in writing complex SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions
* Demonstrated expertise in query optimization and analyzing execution plans
* Ability to prioritize tasks and work under pressure to meet deadlines
* Collaborative team player with good interpersonal and communication skills
* Be able to attend on-call rotation


**It’s Great if you have:**
* PostgreSQL certification is a plus
* Experience with GitLab version control systems and containerization with Docker
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies
* Familiarity with NoSQL databases and concepts for handling unstructured data


**This position is based in Bangkok, Thailand (Relocation Provided)**
 #sanfrancisco #sanjose #losangeles #sandiego #oakland #denver #miami #orlando #atlanta #chicago #boston #detroit #newyork #portland #philadelphia #dallas #houston #austin #seattle #sydney #melbourne #perth #toronto #vancouver #montreal #shanghai #beijing #shenzhen #prague #Brno #Ostrava #cairo #alexandria #giza #estonia #paris #berlin #munich #hamburg #stuttgart #cologne #frankfurt #hongkong #budapest #jakarta #bali #dublin #telaviv #milan #rome #tokyo #osaka #kualalumpur #amsterdam #oslo #manila #warsaw #krakow #bucharest #moscow #saintpetersburg #capetown #johannesburg #seoul #barcelona #madrid #stockholm #zurich #taipei #bangkok #Phuket #istanbul #london #manchester #edinburgh #kiev #hcmc #hanoi #wroclaw #poznan #katowice #rio #salvador #IT #ENG #4 #IT #4 #5
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Affärsutvecklare med fokus på kundrelationer och datadrivna lösningar
description:
Här erbjuds du en gyllene mellanväg inom IT och relationsskapande i en och samma roll. Vi söker nu dig som har bra koll på Big Data och trivs i en social miljö där att knyta starta kontakter är A&O. Om detta är du, sök idag!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm innerstan
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid, tillsvidare
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Så snart som möjligt
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vår kund arbetar med att hantera data och är ledande i Norden inom hantering av stora datamängder, med mål att skapa smarta och effektiva lösningar för sina kunders datahantering. Bolaget präglas av värdeorden kompetens, öppenhet, ärlighet, omtanke och företroende, där de vill att sina anställda ska trivas och utvecklas på lång sikt. Under de senaste åren har bolaget växt i snabb takt och söker nu en ny kollega för att utöka affären hos de kunder man redan har och hitta fler behov.
 


  


 I denna roll kommer du arbeta ut mot företagets befintliga kunder med att identifiera nya behov. Detta genom att förstå deras verksamhet på innovativa sätt och se möjligheterna till fler affärer. Det viktigaste i rollen kommer vara att bygga starka relationer till dina kontaktpersoner och hitta nya möjligheter till affärer.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* En långsiktig tjänst i ett bolag som växt de senaste 10 åren och som fortsätter att göra framsteg tekniskt och med sina kunder
  
* En arbetsplats med seniora kollegor som arbetat tillsammans länge och trivs riktigt bra i varandras sällskap
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Arbeta med upphandlingar och anbud
  
* Kontinuerlig kontakt med befintliga kunder för att hitta nya behov (ej uppsökande försäljning)
  
* Göra behovsanalyser på kunder
  
* Gå på event för att upprätthålla relationer och nätverka
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**

 För att passa i denna roll ser vi att du har ett par år bakom dig inom IT-branschen, antingen i en teknisk eller en mer säljinriktad roll. Du har god förståelse för Big Data och datahantering i olika typer av bolag. Det kommer vara av största vikt att du har en god förmåga att bygga relationer och vårda dem över tid.
 


  

  
* Språk: Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
  
* Utbildning: Minst en högskoleingenjörsexamen inom IT eller utbildning såsom systemvetare
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Social
  
* Ansvarstagande
  
* Ordningsam
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
